gmmaker > physShapeGeometry

physShapeGeometry 

interface physShapeGeometry

Definition of a shape's geometry data.

Summary

Properties from physShapeGeometry

number
a

[Box and polygon only] Angle in degrees. Changing it does not affect polygons, as their vertices have already been affected by it beforehand.
vector2d
c

Shape offset. Changing this coordinate will have no effect on polygons, only on circles and boxes.
number
r

[Circle only] Radius of the circle.
vector2d
s

[Box only] Size of the box, as a vector (x axis is width, y axis is height).
number
s

[Polygon only] The scale of the polygon defined in the map editor. Changing this value will have no effect on the polygon.
boolean
sk

[Box and circle only] Whether the shape will shrink or not.
"bx" | "ci" | "po"
type

Geometry type.
vector2d[]
v

[Polygon only] The vertices that make up the polygon.

Public Properties

a gmm.d.ts:456 
a: number

number

[Box and polygon only] Angle in degrees. Changing it does not affect polygons, as their vertices have already been affected by it beforehand.

c gmm.d.ts:448 
c: vector2d

vector2d

Shape offset. Changing this coordinate will have no effect on polygons, only on circles and boxes.

r gmm.d.ts:468 
r: number

number

[Circle only] Radius of the circle.

s gmm.d.ts:452 
s: vector2d

vector2d

[Box only] Size of the box, as a vector (x axis is width, y axis is height).

s gmm.d.ts:464 
s: number

number

[Polygon only] The scale of the polygon defined in the map editor. Changing this value will have no effect on the polygon.

sk gmm.d.ts:472 
sk: boolean

boolean

[Box and circle only] Whether the shape will shrink or not.

type gmm.d.ts:439 
type: "bx" | "ci" | "po"

"bx" | "ci" | "po"

Geometry type.

Can be:

  • "bx": A box (rectangle)
  • "ci": A circle
  • "po": A polygon.
v gmm.d.ts:460 
v: vector2d[]

vector2d[]

[Polygon only] The vertices that make up the polygon.
